I have lived in this neighborhood for 10 years. I was sad when I first moved here from Riverdale. I missed my friends and family, but my mom and dad wanted a better life for me and my sister. They wanted a better house, a good high school, and a safe place.

Over time, I made new friends and new enemies. I never really got to know my neighbors until I met Mr. Glen and his family. They are nice people. We consider them like family. I enjoyed their wedding. It was fun.

I remember Mr. Glen's wife threw away her crutch, and I caught the strap. We all danced and had a good time. I played with their daughter Marsharii. I hope she's happy now.

The neighborhood is like a maze, but I have a GPS now. I can explore it. I like to play video games with my friends Kason and Curtis. We also play outside and go to the park. It's peaceful there. I like to practice my balance with sticks from Home Depot. I also have a wooden sword.

There is a basketball and tennis court. I used to play tennis with my dad and Mr. Graves. They made us work hard, but it was fun. I think I've had a good time in this neighborhood. I am excited to see what the future holds.

I like my neighborhood because it is close to my college. I can walk to class. There are many apartment buildings in my neighborhood. Some buildings have restaurants and bars. These places are fun and not very expensive. One bar changed its name recently. It is more expensive, but the staff and drinks are good.

Many people live in my neighborhood. They are mostly students or people who do not make a lot of money. The rent is not high. There is an elementary school nearby. Many children live in the area.

I do not know my neighbors well. They smoke a lot of marijuana. The manager of my building put a device to take away bad smells outside their door. My boyfriend and I think this is funny. It is like a joke.

The buildings in my area are old, but they may have new insides. Some buildings near the campus are new. But I do not like them. They were not built well, but the rent is high. I think this is unfair.

There is a cheap restaurant near my home. They serve food on paper plates. Most of their food is cooked in a microwave. Across from this restaurant is a gas station. This is a place people do not like to work.

The road near my home was fixed with money from the city. Now there is a wide sidewalk and many trees. My area is more beautiful now.

My apartment building has many trees around it. The manager cut some of the trees, so there are stumps. There are more trees near my home than in another street. Behind my building is a line of trees and another set of apartments.

I live on 42nd Street. Behind me is 43rd Street. This street is not as nice. The sidewalk is broken and the buildings look old. There are many trees on this street. Maybe the trees hide the bad buildings. There has been some crime near my home. But it happens in other places too. I like my neighborhood. It is close to my college. There is a store and a bus stop near my home. I can easily go to the store or downtown.

My neighborhood is made up of houses that look like single houses. But they are connected. Each house is painted yellow, with a white porch and a green roof. Most people know each other. We stand together at the end of a street some evenings. We talk and watch the children play outside. It is a happy time in a busy world. It is like living in the past.

We live near fields and trees. The sky is blue and there are white clouds. We have beautiful weather usually. But sometimes we get bad weather. Last night we had a tornado warning. We had to go to a safe place. I was in the bathtub with my little dog. My other dog stayed in the living room. He was very nervous. 

After the storm, the road was hot. The hail had melted on the ground. The sun came out and it started to rain. We saw a beautiful rainbow. I took a picture with my camera. My friends and family liked the picture. It made them happy. The street was quiet for a while after the storm. Then people started coming home. We went back to normal. 

I like my neighborhood. It is a nice place to live. I have a small apartment with two rooms and two bathrooms. But my apartment is not the same as my neighbors'. Some apartments are very small. I like to walk in the big field behind my house. I see deer and hear a big frog singing. It is a good place to live. We are close to the city of Charlotte. We have roosters singing in the morning. We also have a donkey at a nearby farm. He brays in the evening. I am lucky to live here.

I moved here when I was about to start eighth grade. At first, I had a hard time making friends. But then I got close to two people who lived near me. They do not live here anymore, but I still remember them. Most of the people who lived here when I arrived are still here. My neighborhood is like many American suburban neighborhoods. There are many two-story houses. Every weekend, I hear kids playing outside when it is warm. The neighborhood is usually quiet most days. I have never had a problem with anyone in the neighborhood. They leave you alone unless you need help. I have ordered packages online and never had a problem with them being stolen. I feel safe in my neighborhood. There is a park nearby. I have many good memories there. I played basketball, football, and baseball with my friends. I also got hurt there once when someone hit me in the nose playing football. But I like the good memories more. Now, I go to the park to spend time with my younger cousin's kids. They like to play on swings and slides. The park makes me feel happy and sad at the same time. My neighborhood is different from others. You can find many kinds of food nearby. There are Chinese, Indian, Mexican, and Italian restaurants within one mile. But many people use food delivery apps like GrubHub and DoorDash now. There are also many fast food places and pizza shops. We have many stores with everything we need. There are dry cleaners, a pharmacy, and a grocery store. Some stores are special, like an Indian store where you can buy Indian food or ingredients to make it. I like my neighborhood. Reading about bad things that happen to people with their neighbors makes me happy to have a good one.

My neighborhood is a small town in South Carolina. It is not special, but it is important. Johnston is called the Peach Capital of the World. Many peach trees and cattle are in this area. Houses are far apart from each other. They are usually two stories high with metal or gray roofs to keep cool in the hot summer.

There are no stores near me, but in the center of town, there is a stop light. This is where you can find stores. There are three places to eat fast food: Hong Kong, a Chinese restaurant; Fiesta, a Mexican restaurant; and Gary's, a burger place. There used to be a pizza place, but it closed.

There is a small pharmacy called Maxwell and Halford Drug. People go there for Cherry Coca-Cola. There is also a grocery store called IGA. But people often go to Walmart in another town to buy most of their groceries.

The most popular store is Dollar General. It sells many things and is always busy. There is a furniture store called Possibilities Furniture. It has been in Johnston for a long time. They deliver furniture to your house. Next to the furniture store is a place called Clark's Cuts and Kennels. They take care of animals.

There is a school called Johnston Elementary School. Children go there until they are in fifth grade. Then they go to another town for middle and high school. We are making a new park. But right now, there is nothing much to do in Johnston. There are no movie theaters, bowling alleys, or playgrounds. But it is a nice town.

I first heard about my area from a podcast about people who are missing. It was a surprise. Many apartments in the area cost over one thousand dollars a month. I had not heard about this story before. Neither had my friends. Maybe this is what makes it hard. I know some of my friends feel sad at night. Things are expensive, but we have learned to save money. We like things that are cheap. We like the smell of old toys and clothing. When you grow up, you do not smell as much. Some people start to smoke. Some people get used to the situation. But the flea market is always there. The smell of old magazines on a piano is strong. It stays in the leather even after you wash it. There are three second-hand stores near my home. You can walk to them. If you start on one side, you can visit two charity stores, a library, a rare book store and a special shop. The streets are crowded in the city center. Cars and people are everywhere in the morning. But inside the stores, it is quiet. It is a good place to spend an afternoon. Many people come to the city every year. It is a city that is growing. One of the big companies that sells things online and delivers them is based here. The city is still getting better. It reminds me of New York. Everyone is busy with their own goals. Nobody usually asks for help. You can be alone if you want. People will leave you alone. This is different from the South, where people care about each other. Here, you do not ask personal questions. You can keep to yourself if you want to. The city is lively. There are musicians living next door and singers upstairs. There is always something happening. We do not feel like strangers in our apartment building. We are like friends. We help each other when we need it. We celebrate birthdays and help each other when we are sad. I like my neighbors. They are kind to me. I try to be kind to them too. I clean after myself and leave food for them. They do the same. We bring mail to each other. It's nice to see them. I think they like my company as much as I like theirs. I live in a big building. It is not very human. But my neighbors make me feel like I am not alone.

I live in a common type of neighborhood. It is like many others. My neighborhood is in a suburban area. You can see this when you look at the houses. They are all the same. The homeowner's association makes sure they are kept in good condition. The front yards are similar. There is a small patch of grass, some small stones, and a short driveway. The houses are usually one story, but some are two stories.

The roads in our neighborhood are very good. They are new and smooth. You do not see many potholes. The neighborhood has many things that make it nice to live here. We have community pools that anyone can use. There are walking trails where you can walk your dog or take a walk by yourself. We have a lot of space, so you can walk around the neighborhood to get exercise.

Most people in the neighborhood are old. But we also have some middle-aged and young people. The neighborhood is safe. Everyone looks out for each other. We have many things that people need, like a mall. It is not very big, but it works. We have many stores, including ones that sell healthy food and ones that have cheap things.

It takes 15 minutes to drive to the city. But when you get there, you can find many stores. We have many nice things in our neighborhood. The neighborhood is safe and well-maintained. We have pools and walking trails. But we do not have stores right next door. You can just drive to the city and find what you need.

I live in a small town in the Midwest. It is near a big city. My neighborhood is on the east side of the town. It is not the best area. Many houses are rented or owned by people who do not have a lot of money. But it is not a bad place. My neighbors are friendly. They say hello when I walk down the street.

Crime is a little higher in my neighborhood. There have been some bad crimes in the past. Some people have been shot and killed. But we are lucky. We have not been hurt. Sometimes, things go missing from our porch if we leave them outside.

The town I live in is affected by a big problem called the opioid epidemic. Many people have died from a strong drug called fentanyl. But we have help. There are places where people can go to get better. They can learn to stop using the drug.

My son goes to a good school. The teachers and staff are kind. He has friends and likes to go to school. The school gives free breakfast and lunch to all students. No one goes hungry. The town is trying to make our neighborhood look better. They have fixed roads and parks. But they have not done much on our side of town.

I like living here. People are friendly, the schools are good, and there are stores to buy things we need. Our home is not expensive, but it is comfortable. I have lived here for 16 years. I do not want to move.

My neighborhood is special. It is on a hill. Many old buildings are there. They have history. I live in a 7-story apartment building near an old theater. A bar is a block away. People go there on warm summer nights. Many people want to go in, so there is a long line. A park is a few blocks away. It is big. People walk around the park on a concrete path. There are stairs in the wall. In the winter, homeless people put up tents. They are close together. They keep warm. They are close to a center where people can bathe and shower.

I like my city. I like the people. Many years ago, this was a bad place. There was much violence. The government and police came to clean the streets. The people remember. They still tell stories about it. The people work hard to keep the neighborhood clean. They care about what happens in their city.

Some people say you should not walk in my neighborhood at night if you are white. I think this is not true. I am light-skinned, but I feel like I am one of them. I know the neighborhood is rough. But I feel safe there. People are kind. A laundromat owner helped me when I was in trouble. Someone gave me money when I was cold and grey. They said I was beautiful.

This is my home. I feel alive when I walk in the neighborhood at night. I meet people who are kind. They are my friends.

I live in a small town in Michigan, in the United States. This is a place where farmland and small tourist cities are common. You will not find big city malls or big stores like Walmart or Target. If you want to go somewhere, you must use a car. But my town is one of the most beautiful places in the world. We have a lot of water around us. Beautiful Lake Michigan is on one side, and Lake Charlevoix is on the other. You can find a beach to swim in almost everywhere you go.

My neighborhood is like a small town. Houses are not close together. They are not the same. Some houses are old and some are new. Many houses have basements. You can see the basements from the road. Most houses have aluminum siding. You can see many different colors in the houses around my home. Every house has a yard. Some yards have trampolines and playsets for kids. Some people have gardens and fences for their animals.

The people who live here are hard workers. They work to make a living and raise their families. On any day, you will see kids playing outside and people walking their dogs or riding bicycles. Neighbors know each other and can tell who belongs and who does not. Everyone is friendly and says hello to each other. The lawns are well cared for. Leaves are not piled up on the lawns. The grass is cut and kept under control. People take care of their plants and bushes.

This is not a beautiful neighborhood that you think is very nice when you see it. But it is a good place to live. It is quiet and peaceful and safe. You can walk to the police station and the health department. The city's recycling center is nearby. We also have baseball and softball fields where you can hear the announcers calling the game. Our small airport is near the fields. You can hear the small planes flying and landing. You can walk to get ice cream or go downtown from my neighborhood. My kids can ride their bikes to the park, which is only a few blocks away. This is a great place to live.
